comments:
Build id: I20070921-0919

When triggering codeassist in following source code, a NPE is thrown (see below)

class A<T> {
        public void foo(A<?> s) {
        }
}
class D extends A<String> {
	foo<CODEASSIST HERE and pick method override>
}
class B extends A<Object> {
        public void foo(A<Object> s) {
        }
}
class C extends A {
    public void foo(A<Object> s) {
    }
}
